INCIDENT UPDATED 4 DAYS AGO

Approximate Location

35.927 latitude, -115.54 longitude

Incident Overview

The Potosi Fire is burning on the west side of Potosi Mountain on the Humboldt-Toiyabe National Forestâ€™s Spring Mountain National Recreation Area near Las Vegas. Currently, the fire is 100% contained and in patrol status.


Basic Information

Current as of
Incident TypeWildfire
CauseLightning
Date of OriginThursday July 06th, 2017 approx. 07:00 PM

Current Situation

Size420 Acres
Percent of Perimeter Contained100%
Fuels Involved

Pinyon-Juniper

Outlook

Projected Incident Activity

In patrol status.

Remarks

100% control anticipated at end of week.
